cloud_id.description: Atlassian site URL or cloud ID

issue_type.description: Default issue type name for unit tickets

issue_type_id.description: Jira issue type ID (overrides issue_type name lookup)

labels.description: Map of unit discipline to Jira label arrays

story_points.description: Whether to estimate and set story points on unit tickets

story_points_field.description: Jira field ID for story points (e.g., 'customfield_10014'). Varies per Jira instance.

epic_link.description: Whether to link all unit tickets to the intent epic

issue_links.description: Whether to create Blocks/Blocked-By links from unit depends_on DAG

link_types.description: Jira link type names for DAG relationships

blocked_by.description: Link type name for 'blocked by' direction

details.description: Additional ticket content requirements (field name to requirement level)
